--- In gladiator@y..., gladiatorbc@y... wrote:
> HI whenever I try to save a scenerio I created an error pops up 
> saying "error saving(then the scenerio name)"
> If anyone can help please do.

Hmm.  Try reinstalling Gladiator.  If you were using the scenario 
converter to edit the scenario, you might have messed up the file.

(Something to look at is definitely making the scenario converter 
program more sensitive in errors in files.)
